Eric Schmidt guided Google past early doubts that it could build a leading ad business around a search engine. He also oversaw the 2004 initial public offering, was the biggest for an internet firm. We view this as evidence of the founders staying fully engaged in the business- a positive, said Citigroup analyst Mark Mahaney . Start of sidebar. Skip to end of sidebar.

announced Thursday that co-founder Larry Page, pictured in 2007, would replace Eric Schmidt as chief executive of the Internet giant in April. Google said Eric Schmidt would remain with the company as executive chairman and focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships. The firm's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will work on strategic projects and new products, Google said in a statement. It said the management changes would take effect on April 4.

the first time as a Piston, Allen Iverson scored 17 points and led Detroit to a 107-97 victory over the slumping Milwaukee Bucks.`` With everything going on, I wanted to play well,'' Allen Iverson said. I just wanted to play well. Especially for my teammates because I let them down by not being here. Allen Iverson was benched by Pistons coach Michael Beasley Curry to begin the game, punishment for missing a mandatory team practice on Thanksgiving.
